name: Ophisk
description:
(This game was made fot the Mini Jam 110)

PLEASE, IF YOU CAN, PLAY THE WINDOWS VERSION

The HTML5 version have a lot more bugs, like infinite hearts, or the game dying when you change tab. The windows version still has a lot of bugs, but less destructive ones...

- Controls -

Arrows, or A/D to move

Escape to pause / cancel trade

Space to select trade

F to fullscreen / window mode

M to mute / unmute music
